RankDef.description: An aspiring member of the Buoyant Armigers, training in both martial and mystical arts.
A newly inducted Buoyant Armiger, trained in both martial and mystical arts to face the darkness.
A seasoned Buoyant Armiger, experienced in battles against daedra and other supernatural foes.
A battle-hardened veteran with deep knowledge of dark forces and the skills to defeat them.
An elite champion among the Buoyant Armigers, capable of leading expeditions against the most dangerous supernatural threats.
A commander of Buoyant Armigers, coordinating multiple expeditions against dark forces.
A high-ranking leader of the Buoyant Armigers, overseeing regional operations.
The supreme commander of the Buoyant Armigers, a legendary warrior-mystic with unmatched skill in combating dark forces.
